verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Though I be nothing I accept The uttermost Thou givest One life alone between us now One life the life Thou livest{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Though I be nothing I exult In Thy divine perfection And taste the deep mysterious joy Of absolute subjection{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Though I be nothing I rejoice To find my all in Thee Not I but Christ forevermore Amen - So let it be{/lang-eng}
